column1: 212317,Technical Director,,"Determine technical requirements of productions or projects
column3: Supervise technical operations of production to ensure creative direction is realised
column7: Operate communications, transmissions or broadcasting equipment
column9: Edit audio, photographs or video recordings
column13: Collaborate with others to prepare or perform artistic productions
column15: Manage content of broadcasts or presentations
column19: Study scripts to determine project requirements
column21: Collaborate with others to determine technical details of productions
column23: Operate control consoles for sound, lighting or video
column25: Coordinate logistics for productions or events
column31: Report information to managers or other staff
column35: Maintain records, documents or other files
column41: Select staff, team members or performers
column43: Maintain knowledge of current developments in area of expertise
